about.title: About Us
about.missionText: At JobAndRoll, we're dedicated to connecting talented professionals with great job opportunities. Our mission is to make job searching and hiring as efficient and enjoyable as possible.
about.storyText: Founded in 2023, JobAndRoll began as a small project to improve the job search experience. Today, we've grown into a comprehensive platform serving job seekers and employers around the world.
about.teamMember1Bio: Jane has over 15 years of experience in HR and tech. She founded JobAndRoll to revolutionize how people find jobs.
about.teamMember2Bio: John leads our engineering team, bringing 12 years of experience in developing scalable web applications.
about.teamMember3Bio: Alex ensures our platform runs smoothly and delivers exceptional service to all our users.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create or modify your account, post a job, or contact us.
